nodes.text: Stenness pie was a baked dessert, possibly originating from the planet Stenness.

The astromech droid R2-D2 was programmed with a recipe for Stenness pie, which he gave to C-3PO during their tenure as employees of the Pitareeze family. According to C-3PO, the pie was a favorite food of the offworlders who took the Kalarba Safari tour. When the pirate Huba captured the droid duo, and later attempted to promote R2-D2 to the rank of captain, the droids traded the Stenness pie recipe for their freedom.
